title: Tien Sing Vegetarian Restaurant and Catering
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, Catering, Fusion
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian restaurant was one of the first vegetarian restaurants in Brunei. Founders were strict long term vegetarians and understood the difficulty (back then) of having a safe, clean and reliable restaurant to serve their food. Uses no onion or garlic.
